name: Burst
description: Challenge your music! Destroy enemies. Avoid obstacles. Run for your life...and points. Go for a high score and always fight to the beat! Only .ogg files are supported.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DX9 (shader model 2.0) Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DX10 (shader model 3.0) Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Meh. It just feels really... Lacking I guess. The controls are pretty bad too. There needs to be more enemy types.
i only have one problem, the ogg only which is extremely annoying!!!!! The games super adictive tho. of course i listen to top with this :8bitheart:
